amendment.description: An amendment numbered 81 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit the use of funds to give formal notification under, or prepare, propose, implement, administer, or enforce any rule or recommendation pursuant to, section 115 of the Clean Air Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act to give formal notification under, or prepare, propose, implement, administer, or enforce any rule recommendation pursuant to section 115 of the Clean Air Act relating to international air pollution and policy initiatives.
